# List of ambassadors of the Republic of China to Tuvalu

|last =
|abolished =
|succession =

|salary =

The Taiwanese Ambassador to Tuvalu is the official representative of the Republic of China to Tuvalu.

|Clément A.K. Tsien
|钱爱虔
|The Republic of China has not set up an embassy in Tuvalu since it established diplomatic relations with the country in 1979. The ambassador to Tonga, Clement A.K. Tsien, also served as ambassador to Tuvalu.
|Sun Yun-suan
|Toaripi Lauti
